Package gr.aueb.cf.ch11_ch12.exercises_ch12.bankapp.model

Class OverdraftAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.aueb.cf.ch11_ch12.exercises_ch12.bankapp.model.OverdraftAccount
  • public final class OverdraftAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines an OverdraftAccount OverdraftAccount.
    Includes id, overdraftHolder, iban, balance
    With mutator methods: setBalance(double)
    And accessor methods: getId(), getOverdraftHolder(), getIban(), getBalance()
    Public API methods:
    deposit(double), withdraw(double, Holder), getOverdraftAccBalance(), getOverdraftAccState()
    Validation method:
    isValidOverdraftHolder(Holder)
    Author:
    gvogiatzis

        public void deposit​(double amount)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        deposits a zero or positive amount of money to Overdraft account's balance
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of money to be deposited
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the amount is negative

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw​(double amount,
                     Holder overdraftHolder)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Withdraws a certain amount of money from Overdraft account's balance if the Holder is valid and gives the option to make an overdraft withdrawal up to a certain limit, if balance is not sufficient.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to be withdrawn
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the amount exceeds account's overdraft withdrawal limit.
